item.title: Where to put this at..?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Being able to resolve my situation yesterday, I later found out it does not work where I had it placed.
Old placement:
This is in the applyDead void…

if(c.duelStatus <= 4) { c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); } else if(c.duelStatus != 6) { c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!"); } //wrath if(c.curseActive[17] && c.oldPlayerIndex > 0) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; c.startAnimation(12583); int wrathDMG = Misc.random(30); o.dealDamage(wrathDMG); o.handleHitMask(wrathDMG); o.getPA().refreshSkill(3); stillGfx(2259, c.absY+3, c.absX-3, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2260, c.absY+1, c.absX-1, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2259, c.absY+2, c.absX-2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2260, c.absY+1, c.absX-2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2259, c.absY, c.absX-2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2260, c.absY-1, c.absX-2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2259, c.absY+1, c.absX+1, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2260, c.absY+2, c.absX+2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2259, c.absY+1, c.absX+2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2260, c.absY, c.absX+2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2259, c.absY-1, c.absX+2, c.heightLevel, 0); stillGfx(2260, c.absY-2, c.absX+3, c.heightLevel, 0); c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); }
But does not work there, where should I put it, so it will work?

Read full topic
